page.title: 15Beach Combing & The Tavern.
page.content: Finally we went round S.E.Point where we saw four seals on Rat Island.As we approached the landing beach George, the lighthouse keeper,beeped the fog horn at us. {Beach Combing.}While the others were walking on Rat Island we went beach combing.We found Limpets on the move,Bread Crumb Sponge(Myxilla,)Sea Anemones, Periwinkles, Dog Welks and Barnacles.Then we found Egg Wrack, Bladder Wrack, Spiral Wrack, Saw Wrack and Channel Wrack. {24th May.}On Thursday night,we went to the Tavern. There was a man with long white hair, he was playing the accordian.We all had a sing-song. Today we did interviews,David,Ryan, Jamie,Karl and Aly interviewed Brent, he is the only child on the island,he is four. {David Hinchliffe.}
